title: How to Make Jack Fruit Fritters (With  Eggs)

steps.headline: Separate jackfruit segments.
steps.description:
If fruit is not properly mature, steam for a few minutes, until soft. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Mix flour, egg yolks, oil and blend well.
Remove seeds from Jack fruit segments.
Beat egg whites till stiff and add into flour and egg yolk batter.
Add baking soda and remaining spices and mix well.
Drain well on paper and serve hot.
Ideal as a snack or side dish, served with sauces and pickles.

text:
Separate jackfruit segments. If fruit is not properly mature, steam for a few minutes, until soft. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Jack-Fruit-Fritters-%28With-Eggs%29-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Mix flour, egg yolks, oil and blend well. Leave aside for 10 minutes. Remove seeds from Jack fruit segments. Beat egg whites till stiff and add into flour and egg yolk batter. Add baking soda and remaining spices and mix well. Dip segments into batter. Deep fry in oil Drain well on paper and serve hot. Ideal as a snack or side dish, served with sauces and pickles.
